products.title: Choices Luster Glacier Grey  Roller Blind
products.description: With a touch of twinkle and an incredibly cool colour, this choices luster glacier grey roller blind is a modern blind for a perfect modern home. We all know that the love of grey is going nowhere, but with this textured surface and silvered undertones, this blind is at the peak with a touch of twinkle and an incredibly cool colour, this choices luster glacier grey roller blind is a modern blind for a perfect modern home.

products.title: Luster, Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of luster grey is the way in which it breaks up the traditional single colour fabrics with dashes of white. It gives the whole blind a larger than life quality that lets the light flow around your room without saturating the existing colours. Introducing other finely detailed finishes would be an inspired choice if you want to continue the theme around the room. Look to the natural world for inspiration by focusing on the huge variety of wood grains that you can introduce with your furniture and flooring.

products.title: Luster Glacier Grey Roman Blind
products.description: With a light shimmer and strong texture, this luster glacier grey roman blind will twinkle its way into your home and into your heart. Glitter it may not be, but it has just as much pizzazz. The shade of grey is wonderfully warm too. We'd love to see this blind nestled against l with a light shimmer and strong texture, this luster glacier grey roman blind will twinkle its way into your home and into your heart.
